pages.text: Familiar Rings consist of a soul gem mounted on a ring that contains a djinni. The djinni in the ring allows the familiar captured in the soul gem to apply effects to the wearer.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: To use a Familiar Ring, simply capture a summoned (and tamed) familiar and then wear the ring as Curio to make use of the effects the familiar provides. When released from a familiar ring, the spirit will recognize the person releasing them as their new master.
